abstract: In a promotion for Dove soap, women can submit a photo of themselves that will then be displayed on a digital billboard in Times Square.
snippet: In a promotion for Dove soap, women can submit a photo of themselves that will then be displayed on a digital billboard in Times Square.
lead_paragraph: Women confident enough to want to see themselves on a billboard in Times Square can have their wish come true this week courtesy of Dove. As part of a new promotion called “Show Us Your Skin” the company will display photographs that women submit of themselves. The photos need not be limited to smiling faces. Women can submit a head shot, a full-body shot or focus on a body part like legs, feet or hands.

headline.main: Display Space (for You) High Above Broadway
